title: Thermodynamics Property Chart-Based Flipped Learning Curriculum

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Visual-centric learning environment utilizing attribute charts instead of traditional steam tables, with flipped learning applied through animated videos and multimedia resources

learning_goals: Students can explain the components and interrelationships of key thermodynamic property charts, such as P-v, T-v, and h-s diagrams.
Students can visualize and analyze the states of real thermodynamic cycles (e.g., Rankine cycle) using property charts.
Students can propose at least three strategies for overcoming the limitations of steam tables by utilizing property charts within two weeks.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
